duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate the receipt and distribution of products and materials both inbound and outbound from the facility, including receiving containers and transferring products between warehouses.
Keep in close contact with dispatch and logistics, helping coordinate the delivery/pick up of containers.
Streamline product moving outbound, upkeep and operation of the receiving dock, lead freight lanes.
Identify safety issues and concerns, address and/or communicate to management team.
Use Microsoft Dynamics NAV to receive Transfer Orders and ensure the correct amount of product coming in matches what is in the system.
Set up teams to accomplish daily goals, train and motivate team members, conduct cycle counts of inbound freight, check inbound freight for damages, and ensure daily metrics are being met.
Work well under pressure and time constraints in a fast-paced environment, maintain cleanliness of supervised work area, and ensure the safe working environment of the facility.

Maintain composure in critical situations and communicate clearly with both internal and external stakeholders, prioritize work, demonstrate effective time management skills, all with a high degree of flexibility.
Lead by motivating others and insist on the high standards around safety, performance, and behavior.
Performance of duties outside of normal responsibilities from time to time, as needed.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 2 years in a warehouse environment with at least 1 year of supervisory leadership.
Knowledge of inventory control and warehousing procedures.
Ability to manage and prioritize multiple tasks and projects at one time.
